author: Eric Song
description: The most powerful gaming laptop you can find for under $1,500.
title: For Today Only, the HP Omen Max RTX 5070 Ti Gaming Laptop Drops to Just $1,420

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: The (theoretically) final Mission Impossible movie is now available to watch at home.
title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning Is Now on Digital

author: Jacob Kienlen
title: PlayStation Opens Preorders for a Replica of the Guitar From The Last of Us Part II

author: Eric Song
description: New customers only and you need to bring your own eligible phone.
title: The T-Mobile Metro Phone Plan Offers Unlimited Talk, Text, and 5G Data for Just $25 Per Month

author: Michael Cripe
description: Sony and Sucker Punch Productions have announced Ghost of Yōtei will receive free Legends multiplayer co-op DLC in 2026.
title: Ghost of Yotei Trailer Confirms Free Legends Multiplayer DLC Coming in 2026

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Black Myth: Wukong developer Game Science has revealed a sequel, Black Myth: Zhong Kui, at Opening Night Live 2025.
title: Black Myth: Wukong Developer Game Science Announces Sequel, Black Myth: Zhong Kui

author: Tom Phillips
description: Tonight's Gamescom Opening Night Live broadcast has given us a fresh look at Resident Evil: Requiem, but where's fan-favorite Leon S. Kennedy?
title: Resident Evil: Requiem Trailer Shows Fresh Look at Grace Ashcroft's Backstory, But Where's Leon?

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: I didn't really know what to expect from Vampire: The Masquerade -- Bloodlines 2 given the long, shadowed path it took to finally rest in my undead talons. But leading with a well-written and well-voiced mystery story that lets me explore my urban hunting ground with cool movement abilities has me intrigued to say the least. I don't love the combat so far, and the Masquerade system seems a bit too forgiving. But I'm thirsty to spend more time with it.
title: Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 - We FINALLY Played It

author: Michael Cripe
description: Capcom and Square Enix took the stage at gamescom Opening Night Live 2025 to show off a new collaboration that will see Final Fantasy 14 and Monster Hunter Wilds collide.
title: Monster Hunter Wilds and Final Fantasy 14 Collaborations Reveal New Content Coming This Fall

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: At Gamescom Opening Night Live, we just got a look at the opening cinematic for the next World of Warcraft expansion: Midnight. And with it, we got a taste of what to expect at the focal point of the expansion's start: Quel'Thalas, and the Blood Elf city of Silvermoon.
title: World of Warcraft: Midnight Takes Players Back to a Refreshed Quel'Thalas in the Battle Against the Void

author: Chris Reed
description: Everything you need to know to preorder Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, including what comes in each edition, when it's out, beta info, and more.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Here’s What Comes in Each Edition

author: Chris Reed
description: You can now preorder Kirby Air Riders for Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Kirby Air Riders Is Up for Preorder for the Switch 2 (Out November 20)

author: Tom Phillips
description: More than two decades after the original cult classic Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines, tonight's Gamescom Opening Night Live broadcast has finally given us a release date for its sequel.
title: 21 Years After the Original, Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 Finally Has a Release Date

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Silent Hill f made an appearance at Gamescom Opening Night Live this evening with a brand new trailer, and our first listen at the English actor portraying main character Hinako, Suzie Yeung.
title: Silent Hill f Gamescom Trailer Reveals Suzie Yeung as Hinako

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Ron Gilbert, the industry luminary behind multiple Monkey Island games and Thimbleweed Park, is working on another project, and it's a little different from his usual fare. It's called Death by Scrolling, and it's a roguelike RPG where you're pursued through Purgatory by a constantly-scrolling screen, and Death herself.
title: Monkey Island's Ron Gilbert Is Making a New Roguelike RPG Where the Scrolling Screen Is Trying to Kill You (Again)

author: Tom Phillips
description: The brilliant Indiana Jones and the Great Circle will be Microsoft's first game designed for Switch 2, and it'll launch for Nintendo's new console next year.
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is Xbox's First Nintendo Switch 2 Game

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Fallout Season 2 has its debut trailer fresh from Opening Night Live 2025, revealing a first look at the hotly anticipated Amazon TV show and confirming a December 17, 2025 release date.
title: Fallout Season 2 Trailer Reveals First-Look at a Deathclaw, Mr. House, and a Release Date

author: Tom Phillips
description: CI Games has detailed what to expect from Lords of the Fallen 2 during Gamescom's Opening Night Live, and said its sequel has been shaped by community feedback after an initially rocky reception at launch for the original.
title: Lords of the Fallen 2 Gets Official Reveal Trailer, Still on Track for 2026

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 is finally a reality after an announcement at Opening Night Live 2025. We have a debut trailer, snippets of gameplay, a new faction making its series debut, and a surprise developer.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 Is Finally a Reality — but Its Developer May Surprise You

author: Christian Wait
description: As of Aug. 19, snag two INIU 10,000mAh power banks for $19.79 at Amazon, plus discounts on Fallout 4K, Spawn, MTG Aetherdrift, and Pokémon TCG.
title: The Best Deals Today: The Best Deals Today: INIU Portable Charger BOGO, Fallout 4K Sale, and More

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: FromSoftware’s Sekiro is back from the dead — but rather than getting a sequel, it’s getting an anime adaptation via Crunchyroll in 2026.
title: FromSoftware’s Sekiro Gets the Anime Treatment via Crunchyroll in 2026 — Here’s the Debut Trailer and First-Look Images

author: Tom Phillips
description: Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight has been announced at Gamescom Opening Night Live, featuring an open-world version of Gotham you can drive around in the Batmobile.
title: Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight Announced, Featuring Open World Gotham

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Yes, hello, we're back again with another update on the ongoing saga of "Are we getting a Silksong release date this week?" The answer is, still maybe, but it's not happening at Gamescom Opening Night Live today. Instead, we got almost 30 whole seconds of brand new gameplay, and a reassurance that it is, in fact, coming out this year.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Shows Up at Gamescom: Opening Night Live With Almost 30 Seconds of New Gameplay, as a Treat

author: Simon Cardy
description: In February 2025, Activision finally admitted to using generative AI for some Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 assets. Now, ahead of the release of Black Ops 7, Treyarch associate creative director, Miles Leslie, has clarified the Call of Duty developer's position.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Dev Responds to Generative AI Backlash: 'Not Replace, but Streamline'

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: The action in Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes brings to mind FTL, perhaps the greatest of all space-faring roguelikes. It oscillates between white-knuckle tension when the Cylons demonstrate their incredible force, but much of your time in this game will be oddly dulcet.
title: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes Aims to Deliver an FTL-Like Roguelike

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Will you watch it?
title: Pixar's Elio Is Now Available to Watch at Home After a Disappointing Box Office Run

author: Eric Song
description: Functionally identical to the SN850P, which is officially licensed for the PlayStation 5 console.
title: The WD Black SN850X 2TB SSD Is One of the Fastest PCIe Gen 4 SSDs, and Now Also One of the Cheapest

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Today at Gamescom Opening Night Live's pre-show, the developer of Ghostrunner revealed a new game, Valor Mortis. It's a single-player, first-person soulslike taking place in an alt-history Eastern Europe during a fictionalized version of Napoleon's invasion.
title: Valor Mortis Announced From Developer of Ghostrunner

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: I came out of my session with Denshattack! excited to actually play it myself, and grateful that there are still studios out there that aren’t afraid to go for the gonzo, the weird, the silly, and the ambitious. There are new things under the sun, y’all. All we had to do was find a group of guys crazy enough to say, “Hey, what if a train could do a kickflip?” As it turns out, that answer could be pretty rad.
title: Denshattack! Might Be a Killer Blend of Tony Hawk and Jet Set Radio

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: So, Bubsy's back. You know, Bubsy, the talking orange bobcat mascot from the 90s? He's back, with a new 3D game developed by indie studio Fabraz and published by Atari. It's called Bubsy 4D, and it's Bubsy's first 3D adventure since 1996's (notoriously not very good) Bubsy 3D.
title: Bubsy 3D Is Getting a Sequel, Almost 30 Years Later

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: South Park has returned for Season 27 after closing a massive $1.5 billion deal with Paramount. Here's how to watch new episodes online.
title: How to Stream South Park Season 27 Online

author: Rachel Weber
description: gamescom Opening Night Live 2025 marks the start of the gaming convention in Cologne, and is always packed full of announcements, trailers and gameplay reveals. It's a lot to keep track of, so we're rounding up all the announcements from gamescom ONL as they happen.
title: gamescom Opening Night Live 2025: Everything Announced (Updating Live)

author: Eric Song
description: Save 17% off a genuine region unlocked import model.
title: The Nintendo Switch Joy-Con 2 Controllers Are on Sale For the First Time Ever at AliExpress

author: Tom Phillips
description: Microsoft has announced Wave 2 of the Xbox Game Pass August 2025 lineup, which includes Dragon Age: The Veilguard, Gears of War: Reloaded, Persona 4 Golden, and more.
title: Microsoft Announces Xbox Game Pass August 2025 Wave 2 Lineup

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: What do you know about Kirby? Well, he's round, he's pink. And he can suck up and eat just about anything, and steal whatever powers that thing has. For over 30 years, no one else in Nintendo's roster has tried to do what Kirby does. Until now.
title: Kirby Air Riders Is Letting King Dedede, Meta Knight, Waddle Dee, Others Use Copy Abilities for the First Time

author: Michael Cripe
description: It’s official: Helldivers 2 is getting a Legendary Warbond featuring weapons and cosmetics from Halo: ODST, and its release date arrives in one week.
title: Helldivers 2 Is Officially Getting Halo: ODST Content, But Its First Legendary Warbond Is Going to Cost You

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: 2K Games is laying off an unknown number of individuals at BioShock studio Cloud Chamber, as it undergoes efforts to "rework" its upcoming new BioShock game.
title: BioShock Studio Cloud Chamber Undergoes Layoffs, Appoints Rod Fergusson New BioShock Head

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Inscryption drops to just $7.99.
title: One of My Favorite PC Games of All Time Is Super Cheap During the Humble Bundle Summer Sale

author: Chris Reed
description: We build the new LEGO Arcade Machine.
title: We Build the LEGO Arcade Machine, an Homage to 1980's Gaming Culture

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Team Cherry, the developer of Hollow Knight and Hollow Knight: Silksong, is teasing a "special announcement" of some sort 48 hours from now on August 21 at 7:30 AM.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Developer Teases 'Special Announcement' Later This Week

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Today, Masahiro Sakurai hosted a 45-minute Nintendo Direct solely dedicated to his latest project, Kirby Air Riders. And he opened the presentation by invoking another game, admitting that Kirby Air Riders is "basically Mario Kart".
title: Sakurai Says Kirby Air Riders Is 'Basically Mario Kart' in Extremely Smash Bros-style Direct

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Want to see the 1990 Ninja Turtles fight the Mutant Mayhem crew? Then check out our exclusive preview of TMNT: Battle Nexus.
title: TMNT: Battle Nexus Pits the Multiverse's Ninja Turtles Against One Another

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo's upcoming Switch 2 exclusive Kirby Air Riders will launch on November 20, 2025.
title: Nintendo Announces Kirby Air Riders Release Date

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo's upcoming Switch 2 exclusive Kirby Air Riders will launch on November 20, 2025.
title: Nintendo Announces Kirby Air Riders Release Date and Price

author: Meg Koepp
description: Use IGN's guides to help you grow beanstalks for Jack in the latest Grow a Garden update.
title: All Plant Types in Grow a Garden (Beanstalk Event)

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Kirby Air Riders Nintendo Direct has come to an end after 45 minutes of fresh gameplay details and release date information from director Masahiro Sakurai himself.
title: Kirby Air Riders Nintendo Direct: Everything Announced

author: Robert Anderson
description: You can save 25% on Fallout Season 1's 4K UHD Blu-ray at Amazon right now.
title: Fallout Season 1's 4K UHD Blu-ray is Discounted at Amazon Today In Anticipation of Season 2

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Marvels director Nia DaCosta has compared her experience working on the big budget Captain Marvel flop to her time helming the upcoming 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple. The big difference, she said, was actually having a "solid script" to work with.
title: The Marvels Lacked 'Really Solid Script,' Director Says, 'Which is Always Gonna Just Wreak Havoc on the Whole Process'

author: Eric Song
description: Oustanding specs for its price point.
title: The CyberPowerPC Gaming PC with AMD 9800X3D CPU and GeForce RTX 5070 Ti GPU Drops to $1,899
